---
title: "About this Study"
description: |
  The Study of Life with Type 1 Diabetes is a mixed-method study aimed at <br>1. gaining a multifaceted understanding of what it is like to feel blood sugar levels that are consistently higher and lower than what an average person experiences
  <br>2. Determining the role of resources in making like with diabetes more manageable, 
  <br>3. Assessing the relationship that self adjusting diabetes medication (insulin) has with diabetes outcomes (inclduing mental and physical health as well as blood sugar), and
  <br>4. Exploring what factors are associated with the highest levels of wellbeing among people living with type 1 diabetes
